IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO EDUCATE EACH STUDENT TO HIGH ACADEMIC LEARNING STANDARDS USING A THEMED CURRICULUM THAT WILL FOSTER KNOWLEDGE, LOVE OF, AND RESPECT FOR THE ENVIRONMENT AND THE WILL TO PRESERVE IT FOR FUTURE GENERATIONS.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO EDUCATE EACH STUDENT TO HIGH ACADEMIC LEARNING STANDARDS USING A THEMED CURRICULUM THAT WILL FOSTER KNOWLEDGE, LOVE OF, AND RESPECT FOR THE ENVIRONMENT AND THE WILL TO PRESERVE IT FOR FUTURE GENERATIONS.
IRS990.Desc: TO EDUCATE ELEMENTARY AND HIGH SCHOOL AGED CHILDREN IN ALLEGHENY COUNTY USING A THEMED CURRICULUM.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: NO SCHOLARSHIPS OR OTHER FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE WAS AWARDED BY THE SCHOOL.
FINANCIAL AID IS RECEIVED FROM THE COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION
THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR'S SALARY IS REVIEWED ANNUALLY BY THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: EACH BOARD MEMBER RECEIVES A COPY OF THE FORM 990 VIA THE BOARD PORTAL PRIOR TO FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ANNUALLY OR WHEN NEW BOARD MEMBERS ARE ADDED, A CONFLICT OF INTEREST FORM IS COMPLETED BY BOARD MEMBERS AND REVIEWED BY THE CHIEF STUDENT SERVICES OFFICER AND CEO. ANY MAJOR CONFLICTS THAT ARE NOTED MAY BE ESCALATED TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS FOR FURTHER ACTION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE REVIEWS EXECUTIVE COMPENSATION ANNUALLY. THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE REVIEWS COST OF LIVING ADJUSTMENTS AND PERFORMS AN ANNUAL PERFORMANCE EVALUATION AS PART OF ITS DETERMINATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: SPECIAL EDUCATION SERVICES: PROGRAM SERVICE EXPENSES 1,034,978. MANAGEMENT AND GENERAL EXPENSES 0. FUNDRAISING EXPENSES 0. TOTAL EXPENSES 1,034,978. FOOD SERVICES: PROGRAM SERVICE EXPENSES 531,473. MANAGEMENT AND GENERAL EXPENSES 0. FUNDRAISING EXPENSES 0. TOTAL EXPENSES 531,473. OTHER PROFESSIONAL SERVICES: PROGRAM SERVICE EXPENSES 1,014,437. MANAGEMENT AND GENERAL EXPENSES 390,024. FUNDRAISING EXPENSES 0. TOTAL EXPENSES 1,404,461.
THE PROCESS HAS NOT CHANGED FROM THE PRIOR YEAR.

IdRelatedTaxExemptOrgGrp.PrimaryActivitiesTxt: TO PROVIDE GENERAL SUPPORT AND FUNDRAISING FOR ECS
